alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Magoffin; Morgan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 26 at 8:16AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Kentucky and southeast Kentucky, including the following counties, in northeast Kentucky, Johnson. In southeast Kentucky, Magoffin and Morgan. * WHEN...Until 1115 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 815 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 3 inches of rain have fallen in the last 3 hours. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Paintsville, Barnetts Creek, Flatgap, Staffordsville, Kerz, Oil Springs, Sip, Winifred, Barnrock, Elna, Redbush, Hargis, Galen, Niles, Win, Wittensville, Stambaugh, Fitz, Denver and Chandlerville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
